title: haNNu koNDanu
sahitya:
haNNu koNDanu bAlakrSNanu


anupallavi

  haNNu bEku endu saNNa krSNanubandu kaNNIra tandu beNNe kaLLa ninta


caraNam 1    duDuku mADida piDi nellane koNDa kaDu vEgadinda 
maDadi baLige banda saDagaradinda piDi nellana koTTa
    caraNam 2    iTTaLe haNNa krSNana kaiyali iTTaLe mattondu koTTaLe 
muttondu paTTaLe bhaya bandu kangaTTaLe mana nondu
    caraNam 3    dAta nODida nAri maNiya manavaAta tOrida enthA 
mAya mADida nAda koTTa nellu maNigaLAyitallo
    caraNam 4    tirugi pOdanu muddu krSNanu tirugi tirugi nODi 
maruLige ALAgi tirugi bandavaLu haNNu kUgidaLu
    caraNam 5    ninna horadu anyaranu kANe saNNa krSNa bandu 
enna salahO inde ghanna mahima tande purandara viTTala
